attributes.action: legislate on which cats qualify to wear tartan collars.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that cats should not be allowed to wear tartan collars unless they can prove Scottish ancestry. The wearing of tartan collars by those cats who are not Scottish makes a mockery of the clan system and the law should be changed to reflect this.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
